title: Calories in In-N-Out Milkshake
meta_description: Discover in n out milkshake calories, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Regular size (24 oz), chocolate flavor; values averaged across flavors like vanilla or strawberry; no add-ins.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, exact preparation, and location. Check In-N-Out menu or app for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One regular In-N-Out milkshake has about 590 calories and 10 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out milkshake?
faqs.a: About 590 calories for one regular size.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in In-N-Out milkshake calories query?
faqs.a: Around 70 g carbs, mostly from sugars.

faqs.q: Is In-N-Out milkshake high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 30 g total fat including 20 g saturated per shake.

faqs.q: Do flavors affect In-N-Out milkshake calories?
faqs.a: Minimal difference; chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry are similar at ~590 kcal.

faqs.q: How much protein in In-N-Out milkshake?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 g protein per regular milkshake.
